attributes.action: Replace NFOAP Act 1861 with something up to date
attributes.background: The Non fatal offences against the person act 1861 is essentially the workhorse of law, it's used daily. It's 156 years old this year! It needs repeal and replacement!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
